headline: Deutsche Bank's Premature Downgrade of Lockheed Martin Amid China's Advancements

headline: Northrop Grumman Wins a $481.3M Contract to Aid Missile Defense System
summary: NOC secures a $481.3 million contract for offering updates and improvements to the Integrated Air and Missile Defense Battle Command System's software.

headline: Lockheed Martin Corporation (LMT): A Bear Case Theory
summary: We came across a bearish thesis on Lockheed Martin Corporation (NYSE:LMT) on Substack by Northwest Frontier Capital. In this article, we will summarize the bears’ thesis on LMT. Lockheed Martin Corporation (NYSE:LMT)’s share was trading at $482.25 as of Jan 2nd. LMT’s trailing and forward P/E were 17.45 and 16.98 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. headline: Curtiss-Wright Buys Ultra Energy, Widens Defense & Nuclear Business
summary: CW completes the acquisition of Ultra Energy, a designer and producer of reactor protection systems, neutron monitoring systems, and radiation monitoring systems.

raw.headline: Curtiss-Wright Buys Ultra Energy, Widens Defense & Nuclear Business

headline: Lockheed Martin downgraded to Hold from Buy at Deutsche Bank
summary: Deutsche Bank downgraded Lockheed Martin (LMT) to Hold from Buy with a price target of $523, down from $611. The firm says its lost conviction in its original upgrade thesis from July, and struggles to find new reasons to remain constructive on the shares. Lockheed’s Q3 results failed to fulfill the upside case and disappointed on revenue, the analyst tells investors in a research note. Deutsche also views the reveal of further advancements in combat aircraft capabilities by China as potentially

headline: Spotting Winners: AeroVironment (NASDAQ:AVAV) And Defense Contractors Stocks In Q3
